local_intent: Perceive grapes, compute grasp pose, approach and align to grape with 0.01 tolerance, then verify proximity.
assumptions: Grape is reachable from current pose without collision
IsAt(target=grape) is sufficient to verify alignment post-approach
Perception fallback can yield target visibility if initially missing
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase of the global plan: perceive via Fallback, compute and confirm grasp pose (grasp_grape), execute ApproachAndAlign with tolerance=0.01 and timeout=1500ms, then verify position.
